CustomField.formula: IF( AVO_Permit_Check_32__c, "Water use as provided herein will be subject to water conservation plans for Sub Region 3 designated by the Coastal Georgia Water & Wastewater Permitting Plan for Managing Salt Water Intrusion in 2006, and the method of monitoring is specified in the submitted plans as conditioned by this Permit.", IF( AVO_Permit_Check_10__c, "Under the special provisions of the Flint River Basin Water Development and Conservation Plan approved March 20, 2006, A WATER CONSERVATION PLAN IS REQUIRED. Based on the 2006 Flint River Basin Plan your withdrawal is located in an area designated as a Conservation Use area. A conservation planning form which must be completed and signed is enclosed. The water conservation plan remains a permanent condition of the permit.", null) )
CustomField.label: Water Conservation Plan
